doc.field: Time Inc. New Media Records: Editor Daniel Okrent Files
Time Inc. New Media Records: Editor Daniel Okrent Files

Okrent's correspondence is a mix of business and personal. Records include interoffice memoranda, correspondence from companies interested in partnerships, invitations to professional events, and some correspondence from users of Time Inc. websites and discussion boards. Personal correspondence includes that related to Okrent's professional work outside of Time Inc. as a writer and commentator.

His correspondence also includes transcripts and other material for John Loengard's Life oral history project and remains with the set from 1999 in the original order although this project was conducted earlier.
Time Inc. New Media Records: Editor Daniel Okrent Files
